description: From bum +â€Ž -ery and the idea that they were a collective of bums?

entries.meaning: (originally derogatory, historical) The faction of the Industrial Workers of the World in the 20th century which favored direct action.
examples: When De Leon broke with the I. W. W. in 1908 there were again members of the Party who declaimed against his abandoning the I. W. W. - members who had no sympathy with the bummery element.
There was a scrivener of Wapping brought to hearing for relief against a bummery bond.
